entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain late in the evening then to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
